levels.title: Beginner's Challenge
levels.description: Start with a simple 3x3 grid and three colors. This level is for new players to learn the mechanics.

levels.title: A Bit More Challenging
levels.description: The grid size increases to 4x4, and you'll need to match more tiles to clear the level.

levels.title: Bigger Grid, Higher Goals
levels.description: The grid gets taller, and the goals increase to keep the challenge steady.

levels.title: Tighter Time
levels.description: The grid expands to a 5x5 square, and the time limit is reduced. You'll need to think and act faster.

levels.title: Wider Grid, More Tiles
levels.description: The grid widens and the goals increase significantly. You'll find more matches with only three colors.

levels.title: Larger Goals
levels.description: The grid expands again, and you'll need to hit higher goals for each color. The time limit is still tight, so focus on efficiency.

levels.title: The First Real Test
levels.description: The grid gets taller and the time limit decreases. This level is designed to test your ability to make quick, strategic moves.

levels.title: Big Square Grid
levels.description: A big square grid with a tight time limit and high goals. You will have more options to create large combos.

levels.title: Massive Grid, Massive Challenge
levels.description: This is a grueling level with an expansive grid and a short time limit. You'll need to be fast and meticulous to complete all goals.

levels.title: The Ultimate Challenge
levels.description: The final level with only three colors is an 8x8 grid. With a short time limit and high goals, you will need to find long chains and large matches to succeed.

levels.title: New Color, New Challenge
levels.description: Introducing a new color, Magenta! The grid size and time limit are generous, but you now have more options to consider.

levels.title: Four Colors, Faster Pace
levels.description: With four colors, matches are harder to find. The time limit is reduced to keep you on your toes.

levels.title: New Shape, New Rules
levels.description: Introducing a new shape, the square! Now you need to match both colors and shapes to clear the tiles.

levels.title: Matching More
levels.description: Another new color, Yellow, has been added. The goals have increased to challenge your multi-colored matching skills.

levels.title: The Big Five
levels.description: The grid expands to 9x9 with five colors. The time limit is slightly extended to give you more room to think.

levels.title: Blue Tiles
levels.description: A new color, Blue, is added. The goals have been increased and the time limit is tighter. You'll need to be fast and strategic.

levels.title: Red Alert!
levels.description: A tall grid with the color Red! The goals are high, and the grid is bigger. Don't be fooled, this is a tough one.

levels.title: Purple Patch
levels.description: Introducing the final color, Purple, and a new shape, the diamond! The grid is now a perfect 10x10 square with all available colors and shapes.

levels.title: The Gauntlet
levels.description: You're on the brink of victory. This level sharpens your skills for the ultimate test ahead. It's a final tune-up before the grand finale.

levels.title: The Grand Finale
levels.description: This is the final test of your skills. With a huge grid, all colors and shapes, you'll need to master every aspect of the game to beat the clock and complete your quest.
